title: Define System Architecture
description: Outline the overall design and structure of the ThoughtControlledSmartHome system.

title: Develop Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) Module
description: Design and implement the BCI module that will interpret user's thoughts for home device control. This task includes researching and implementing appropriate machine learning algorithms, ensuring real-time processing, secure data transmission, and consideration of power efficiency due to battery usage in portable devices. Upon completion, conduct thorough testing and document the process.

title: Design Smart Home Device Integration
description: Develop a method for integrating the BCI system with existing smart home devices.

title: Create User Manual for ThoughtControlledSmartHome
description: Develop a detailed and user-friendly manual for operating the ThoughtControlledSmartHome system, outlining the process of thought-based control of home devices. The manual should be comprehensive, easy to understand, and accessible to users with various levels of technical proficiency.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a thorough security audit to ensure user and device data privacy.
